tests.name: Hoop Test
tests.logic: Si FALLA → Hipótesis eliminada | Si PASA → Sobrevive

tests.name: Smoking Gun Test
tests.logic: Si PASA → Hipótesis confirmada | Si FALLA → Sobrevive

tests.name: Doubly Decisive Test
tests.logic: Si PASA → Confirmada | Si FALLA → Eliminada
